rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural lighting through large windows and a clear path for wheelchair accessibility.
An open plan living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows to ensure ample natural light. Adheres to Vastu by aligning the main entrance with the eastern direction.
A modern kitchen placed in the northern area according to Vastu principles, equipped for wheelchair access and designed with ample storage and counter space.
A spacious bedroom featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the southern side for balanced energy flow. It includes a wheelchair-accessible design and an adjoining balcony.

openings.description: Door to the entrance hall, designed with a wide threshold for wheelchair access and incorporating floor-to-ceiling glass panels.
A door connecting the bedroom to its adjoining balcony, ensuring unobstructed outdoor accessibility as per Vastu norms.
